@raiganburns @psysal @NoelFB @kylepulver fixed is better for some games, but there's benefits to using delta in the code even if it's fixed
@raiganburns @psysal @NoelFB @kylepulver IMO code everything in delta time, then set it to fixed if it fits the game
Wow those GDCA nominee lists are stacked. What a crazy year for games. Congrats everyone!
@TommyRefenes still figuring this stuff out for myself but the amount of "censorship" talk lately feels weird to me
@TommyRefenes censorship is when the government has to approve and edit your book before it is published, etc
@TommyRefenes I guess my point is we have laws and courts to protect from mob censorship. They def could still print the flag if they want
@TommyRefenes sure! I've been bullied for artistic choices, but never censored (thank god)
@TommyRefenes censorship is when you take away the ability of an artist to choose. They still have the choice
@TommyRefenes but they can still decide to keep it. And if people still want it they'll still make $$. Backlash != Censorship
@TommyRefenes removing the flag was an artistic choice IMO. Could argue it was a bad one, but not censorship
@TommyRefenes I think "self-censorship" is an oxymoron! If no one forced you to change it, it's an artistic choice
@TommyRefenes I guess they must've weighed that against the amount of potential new fans they'd lose with the racism? Who knows
@TommyRefenes @floatvoid (if I owned that brand I'd also want to quietly distance it from that flag)
@TommyRefenes @floatvoid looks more like the brand owners want to distance themselves from it than censorship? Doubt anyone forced them
@theBanov I'll talk really fast
@theBanov tuesday works

@ADAMATOMIC it's funny bc I wish every F2P game was monetized this way instead
@MllePilgrim @NoelFB yeah area 3 is gonna be so cool when noel and pedro are done with it haha
@raiganburns @kylepulver @ColinNorthway haha yeah I've ranted about it in the past too. Literally roadblocks me every time i try unity
@raiganburns @kylepulver @ColinNorthway yeah it pretty much sums up the argument to roll your own engine doesn't it
@ColinNorthway @kylepulver fuuuuck yes this is very good
@kylepulver @ColinNorthway or does the physics engine need update to run before the overlap "registers"?
@kylepulver @ColinNorthway the real question is: can you move something, check for overlaps, then move it back same frame?
@kylepulver @ColinNorthway solely event-based collisions just don't cut it if your game has to be responsive, imo
